description: This app is designed to give useful information about a beer. It will give the name, abv, style, brewery name and location, and the brewer's description about the beer.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Beer Genius about Pliny the Elder
Alexa, ask Beer Genius to tell me about Sculpin from Ballast Point
Alexa ask Beer Genius to describe The Temptress
name: Beer Genius
shortDescription: A skill that will quickly tell you about beer given the beer name
